description: Really please to see the PIVX core wallet get updated as a snap, flatpak etc. Helps me keep the wallet up to date in a user-friendly manner. Well done Fuzzballs and rest of team.

Pivx 4 is another step forward, the monthly calculated staking info is very helpful 

but BEST is to be able to COLD STAKE - keeping Funds on a cold wallet - just like Masternodes
summary: great with staking, works like a charm
